mapper.insert:
select seq_refno.nextval from dual
insert into referencedata( refno, cno, mid, reftitle, refurl, refweek, refdate, refcreatedat ) values ( #{refno}, #{cno}, #{mid}, #{reftitle}, #{refurl}, #{refweek}, #{refdate}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update referencedata set reftitle=#{dailyNote.reftitle}, refurl=#{dailyNote.refurl}, refweek=#{dailyNote.refweek}, refdate=#{dailyNote.refdate}, refupdatedat=sysdate where refno=#{refno}
mapper.select: select * from referencedata where mid=#{mid} and refweek=#{refweek} order by refdate desc
